original_text: Another thing! Your cousin, Elizabeth, is very old. People said that she could not have a baby. Listen! She also will have a son. The baby has grown inside her now for nearly six months.
korean_text: 보라 네 친족 엘리사벳도 늙어서 아들을 배었느니라 본래 임신하지 못한다고 알려진 이가 이미 여섯 달이 되었나니

sentences.original_text: Your cousin, Elizabeth, is very old.
People said that she could not have a baby.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 그녀가 아기를 가질 수 없다고 말했어.

sentences.original_text: She also will have a son.
The baby has grown inside her now
